version_description: * Set up and receive an alert when a bus is near a stop of your choosing. Note: This will not be available at all transit systems right away.

This major update brings a completely rebuilt DoubleMap app! The interface is now more reliable, better looking, and easier to use for your day-to-day rides!

Based on your feedback, we've added:

* A new route list showing all of the stops along a route
* A "favorite stops" list - by marking stops as a favorite, you can quickly jump to them by going to your favorites list

Minor update notes:

* Fixed some cases where the bus image did not point in the correct direction
* Minor text fixes

This major update brings a completely rebuilt DoubleMap app! The interface is now more reliable, better looking, and easier to use for your day-to-day rides!

Based on your feedback, we've added:

* A new route list showing all of the stops along a route
* A "favorite stops" list - by marking stops as a favorite, you can quickly jump to them by going to your favorites list
* Bug fixes and improvements

Based on your feedback, we've:

* added an additional button to get to the routes selection screen
* added Show All and Show None buttons at the bottom of the route selection screen
* fixed an issue displaying the list of stops when there were pairs of stops

We at DoubleMap appreciate your feedback as we strive to make DoubleMap more convenient for you!

We've fixed a bug in text getting cut off when displaying ETAs for routes that have many buses arriving. We also fixed an issue where the message "Stop details not available..." would be shown in the wrong place.

To help us better respond to feedback, feedback emails include what transit agency you are using.

Also included are customizations and enhancements for specific transit agencies.

• Route schedules are able to be viewed in the Route page
• "No Routes are selected" notification
• URLs in Announcements are clickable
• Stop descriptions are now available
• Bug Fix: Adjust radius for nearby transit systems
*Feature availability may vary depending on the transit system*

* Toggle traffic on/off
* Ability to search routes/stops within each system
* Zoom to view current location and/or routes in view
* Able to view hyperlinks
* Custom bus view (not available for all systems)
* Accessibility improvements
